snippet.title: Berserk Boy - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
A wildly colourful and exuberant 2D action-platformer, Berserk Boy is the premiere title from developer BerserkBoy Games, and introduces players to Kei, aka Berserk Boy, a young hero who has the power to change into multiple elemental forms.

Berserk Boy has an authentic, lovingly crafted retro aesthetic with a visual style influenced by the classic look of 90's games, and is headlined by a pounding 16-bit soundtrack from Sonic Mania composer, Tee Lopes. Tight platforming, gorgeously illustrated cut-scenes, a variety of play-styles, and a rewarding upgrade system ensures Berserk Boy offers a fresh, enjoyable experience for new and veteran players.

Berserk Boy will finally arrive on the PS5® on February 18th! 

#ps5 #ps5games
